column4: Hey everyone, I need some help. I have an inspiron 8500 and I can't connect wirelessly to the internet. What should I do?
It has a brodcom wireless adapter, or something like that
did you try installing the driver from "menu>preferences>additional drivers"?
I think so. I connected to the ethernet cord, and went through an update. I had something pop up asking me to activate the wireless driver, so I did, but it didn't do anything.
